EmailTemplate.name: TEST-Referred by email
EmailTemplate.subject: Refer a friend to IAVA today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Wondering how you can make an impact with the veterans community today? Refer a friend to the great services that IAVA has to offer!
Send your friend this unique web address today to get started. http://www.tfaforms.com/273628?tfa_Referredby={!Contact.Id}
Best,
Anthony -- Anthony Pike Veteran OIF Program Coordinator Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
